topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c3ff7f63687254b83d0100#post_53c3ff7f63687254b83d0100
Whenever real cybernetics come about I'm going to be one of the first people in line.


If anyone is wondering why we don't have real cybernetics yet it's a combination of things.  Biomechatronics falls into multiple categories of why it's not here yet:  They're either too slow/too heavy/need a external cord because of high energy costs and that these factors put together makes it just too expensive to realistically do.

We theoretically could turn a person into a full scifi like cyborg, but it would cost in the ballpark of a hundred million dollars to do so.

topics.body: Did you know lore wise originally vampires didn't catch on fire in the sun, instead it severely weakened them; also that the reason why they avoided daylight was that they were day blind and thus were blind in high light conditions?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c4010a6368721d77100500#post_53c4010a6368721d77100500

Question. You've seen those sci fi's where a guy has a strong robot arm. Wouldn't a robot arm like that really just rip off if you swung it too fast, or tried to punch a wall?

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c401f263687206827f0100#post_53c401f263687206827f0100
Hence why we're not going to have a Adam Jensen.  If you become a full cyborg fine, but if you only had partial augments that would run the severe risk of the augments overcompensating and well:
!http://gifstumblr.com/images/buzz-will-you-get-up-here-and-give-me-a-hand_1204.gif!
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c401f76368726622190400#post_53c401f76368726622190400
The legend of vampires comes from people with a sun allergy.  Originally back in the day people with sun allergies would have to not only avoid daylight, but use animal blood on their blisters to properly heal.

Now we treat people with sun allergies with medical creams meant to block out as much uv and they have to live in buildings with special window glass.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
